title: Is Sehwag Contesting LS Polls on A BJP Ticket from Rohtak? No!
subtitle: The news of Indian cricketer Virendra Sehwag joining Bharatiya Janata Party and contesting elections has again made headlines right ahead of Lok Sabha polls 2019.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The news of Indian cricketer Virender Sehwag joining the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and contesting elections has again made headlines ahead of the Lok Sabha polls.

Media organisations like The Tribune, Navbharat Times, The Times of India carried stories of Sehwag being on the BJP’s probable list to fight from Haryana’s Rohtak seat for the Lok Sabha polls.
